name: eforest-agent-skills
description: eForest OpenClaw tools for symbol-market and forest domain skills.

tools.name: aelf-buy-seed
tools.description: Symbol-Market: check and purchase SEED for asset creation entry.
args: -lc

bun run create_token_skill.ts buy-seed --symbol '{{symbol}}' --issuer '{{issuer}}' --env {{env}} {{#if force}}--force {{force}}{{/if}} {{#if privateKey}}--private-key '{{privateKey}}'{{/if}} {{#if dryRun}}--dry-run{{/if}}

dryRun.description: If true, return dry-run response without write execution

tools.name: aelf-create-token
tools.description: Symbol-Market: create FT token with owned seed symbol.
args: -lc

bun run create_token_skill.ts create-token --symbol '{{symbol}}' --token-name '{{tokenName}}' --seed-symbol '{{seedSymbol}}' --total-supply {{totalSupply}} --decimals {{decimals}} {{#if issuer}}--issuer '{{issuer}}'{{/if}} --issue-chain {{issueChain}} {{#if isBurnable}}--is-burnable{{else}}--no-is-burnable{{/if}} {{#if tokenImage}}--token-image '{{tokenImage}}'{{/if}} --env {{env}} {{#if privateKey}}--private-key '{{privateKey}}'{{/if}} {{#if dryRun}}--dry-run{{/if}}

dryRun.description: If true, return dry-run response without write execution

tools.name: aelf-issue-token
tools.description: Symbol-Market: issue token amount to target address.
args: -lc

bun run create_token_skill.ts issue-token --symbol '{{symbol}}' --amount {{amount}} --to '{{to}}' --chain {{chain}} {{#if issuer}}--issuer '{{issuer}}'{{/if}} {{#if memo}}--memo '{{memo}}'{{/if}} --env {{env}} {{#if privateKey}}--private-key '{{privateKey}}'{{/if}} {{#if dryRun}}--dry-run{{/if}}

dryRun.description: If true, return dry-run response without write execution

tools.name: aelf-forest-create-collection
args: -lc

bun run src/cli/forest_skill.ts run --skill aelf-forest-create-collection --env {{env}} {{#if dryRun}}--dry-run{{/if}} {{#if traceId}}--trace-id '{{traceId}}'{{/if}} {{#if timeoutMs}}--timeout-ms {{timeoutMs}}{{/if}} {{#if privateKey}}--private-key '{{privateKey}}'{{/if}} --field payload.symbol='{{symbol}}' --field payload.tokenName='{{tokenName}}' --field payload.seedSymbol='{{seedSymbol}}' --field payload.issueChainId='{{issueChainId}}' --field payload.owner='{{owner}}' --field payload.issuer='{{issuer}}' --field payload.externalInfo='{{externalInfoJson}}' {{#if inputJson}}--input-json '{{inputJson}}'{{/if}}

dryRun.description: If true, return dry-run response without write execution

inputJson.description: Optional JSON object for additional fields; structured fields override conflicting keys

bun run src/cli/forest_skill.ts run --skill aelf-forest-api-miniapp --env {{env}} {{#if dryRun}}--dry-run{{/if}} {{#if traceId}}--trace-id '{{traceId}}'{{/if}} {{#if timeoutMs}}--timeout-ms {{timeoutMs}}{{/if}} {{#if privateKey}}--private-key '{{privateKey}}'{{/if}} --input-json '{{inputJson}}'

dryRun.description: If true, return dry-run response without write execution

inputJson.description: JSON object string for full skill input
